name: Sushi To Go
description:
Welcome to Sushi To Go

FULL SCREEN + AUDIO RECOMMENDED

Sushi to Go is a platformer game about creating the platforms yourself and helping the little sushi (roll) travel as far as possible to find the person who has crafted him to life.

You play as Maki, the little sushi roll, whose ultimate goal is to find the chief that has created him. Though you must keep Maki safe from attacks of diners' chopsticks and chiefs' knives. You also want to keep him away from the ground as that will cover Maki with dirty dust.

A dice of god is constantly deciding your fortune, it may give you platforms and you can use them to move forward or shield yourself from attacks; yet, it can also destroy your platforms and make you fall to the ground. Hope you the best of LUCK.

How to Play Controls

Your goal is to travel as far as possible while avoiding numerous flying projectiles.
You use space to jump.
A and D to move left and right.
To place down a platform in your queue Right Click your mouse.

Dice Numbers
  • One: destroys the platform under your feet.
  • Two: destroys the platform under your feet and an additional platform. Adds a new platform to your queue.
  • Three (bullet storm): a large number of knives fly towards you.  Adds a new platform to your queue.
  • Four: adds 2 new platforms to your queue.
  • Five (slow-motion): slows time down for a few seconds and adds 3 new platforms to your queue.
  • Six: LUCKY YOU! It adds 6 new platforms to your queue.
